# These are dependencies our code depends on.
# Add developments tools to Pipfile instead

aiodns
aiohttp
boto3
cchardet
certifi
iso3166
jupyter
networkx
geoip2
google-cloud-bigquery
matplotlib
pandas
plotly
pydot
scipy
statsmodels
# ujson is a drop-in replacement for json implemented in C++ and a lot faster:
# https://artem.krylysov.com/blog/2015/09/29/benchmark-python-json-libraries/
ujson
